channel.title: Need help with making npcs talk
channel.description: Ok so im trying to make a npc talk instead of origianl npc that talked.. so i changed the npcid to that npc and all of that in client but when i press talk it still does nothing? any help?

item.title: Need help with making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

it looks like this

                     } else if (NPCID == 801) {
		skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
		skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		NpcWanneTalk = 519;

and btw im using your source ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2008, 09:30:27 pm[/size][hr]Ok i looked at your tut and there is nothing wrong with mine.

Read full topic
